about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of ancient Greek mythology and unleash your creativity with this free DLC! Designed with meticulous attention to detail, our Achilles figurine is a stunning representation of the legendary Greek hero.

With our file pack, you’ll have everything you need to bring Achilles to life. From his iconic armor, including the intricate breastplate and greaves, to his formidable sword and shield, every element has been faithfully recreated.

Embrace the opportunity to delve into the rich world of Greek mythology and immerse yourself in the stories of heroes' past. Whether you choose to display your Achilles figurine proudly on a shelf or use it as a centerpiece for your historical dioramas, this 3D printing file pack opens up endless possibilities for creativity and storytelling.

  • On the STEAM portal/application, enter the phrase "Achilles: Legends Untold" into the search bar;
  • From the list of search results, select the free DLC with the printable figurine;
  • Click the "Download" button;
  • You'll find the files in the "Extras/3D Print Achilles Model" folder inside the game's main directory (Right-click on the game in your library > "Manage" > "Browse Local Files").

Contents:

  • The download size is 491 MB and 1.1 GB after zip extraction;
  • The files are configured for the resin 3D print only;
  • Additional file with a helmetless head variant;
  • Default high is around 20 cm;
  • YouTube manual with info on how to put the figurine together:

With our file pack, you’ll have everything you need to bring Achilles to life. From his iconic armor, including the intricate breastplate and greaves, to his formidable sword and shield, every element has been faithfully recreated.

Embrace the opportunity to delve into the rich world of Greek mythology and immerse yourself in the stories of heroes' past. Whether you choose to display your Achilles figurine proudly on a shelf or use it as a centerpiece for your historical dioramas, this 3D printing file pack opens up endless possibilities for creativity and storytelling.
